page.title: 07Near My House
page.content:
I live in a quiet, unmade-up road, ten minutes walk from Camberley town centre. At the bottom of my garden is another road, on which three new {houses}have been built on the end of peoples' gardens.
There is also a lot of{waste ground which is overgrown with brambles & nettles. The ground belongs to the Cricket Club and is used for hockey in the winter & the pavilion for card games. The area has lots of{trees}and {wildlife:}birds, squirrels, foxes & hedgehogs. The people are very friendly and helpful.
Within easy walking & cycling distance we have the sports centre, town centre, Barossa Common, Watchetts Park &{Lake}& the cinema.
